step1ChooseBrands: Сlick the blue checkbox to deselect brands you do not wish to sell in your storefront.
step3FeatureBrand: Сlick the gold star to make a brand appear before the others on your online storefront - this makes it easy for your clients to shop the brands you love!
step4ViewProducts: Click on specific Brand to review and curate its Products
step5WatchWalkthru: Click here to view our video tutorial of what we just covered!
